title: Russiaâ€™s Exile From World Sports Will End Next Month at Paralympics
summary_full: Six Russian athletes and four Belarusians will be allowed to represent their nations, officials said. The decision could pave the way for a Russian team to compete at the 2028 Summer Games in Los Angeles.
